summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2408, for the improvement of 63rd Avenue Southwest, from Alki Avenue on the north to Alki Avenue on the south; and Alki Avenue, from 63rd Avenue Southwest southerly to the south line of Sea Shore Park Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing temporary wood walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage,; under Ordinance No. 25347 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
